arts.ttl: Rayo Vallecano star says referee admitted error in awarding Barcelona the penalty
arts.sum: The Rayo Vallecano vs Barcelona match at Vallecas was overshadowed by a storm of controversy following referee Busquets Ferrer’s decision to award a penalty to Lamine Yamal. The decision instantly provoked heated protests from the Vallecano players, who surrounded the referee to show their anger and disbelief. arts.ttl: Barcelona wonderkid explains what went wrong against Rayo Vallecano – ‘We lacked intensity’
arts.sum: Barcelona were held to a 1-1 draw against Rayo Vallecano, but one bright spark for the team was once again Lamine Yamal. The youngster showed courage and maturity by scoring Barcelona’s only goal of the game from the penalty spot. It was the first time the Barça number 10 had converted from spot since making […] The post Barcelona wonderkid explains what went wrong against Rayo Vallecano – ‘We lacked intensity’ appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: Joan Garcia, De Jong react after Barcelona’s 1-1 draw vs Rayo Vallecano – ‘We didn’t deserve anything more’
arts.sum: Joan Garcia was Barcelona’s standout performer in their 1-1 draw against Rayo Vallecano. The summer signing kept Barça in the game with several crucial saves, preventing the home side from scoring more goals. arts.ttl: Hansi Flick calls for improvement after Rayo Vallecano 1-1 Barcelona – ‘Not happy with my team’
arts.sum: Barcelona were held to a 1-1 draw against Rayo Vallecano at the always challenging Vallecas Stadium on Matchday 3 of La Liga. The game was marked by high tension, difficult conditions, and plenty of talking points. Barça started strongly and went ahead through a penalty that sparked debate, calmly converted by Lamine Yamal. However, the […] The post Hansi Flick calls for improvement after Rayo Vallecano 1-1 Barcelona – ‘Not happy with my team’ appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: Yamal scores from penalty spot but Barcelona needs goalkeeper Joan García to leave Rayo with a point
arts.sum: Lamine Yamal scored from the penalty spot but Barcelona needed goalkeeper Joan García to ensure it left Rayo Vallecano with a point after a 1-1 draw in the Spanish league on Sunday. Yamal got the penalty after he dribbled past a defender and was knocked down by Pep Chavarría in a foul that was fiercely protested by Rayo’s players and staff.

arts.ttl: Takeaways From Barcelona’s Worrying Performance in 1-1 Draw vs. Rayo Vallecano
arts.sum: Barcelona looked miles off the level they showed a season ago.

arts.ttl: Rayo draw with Barça after contested Yamal pen
arts.sum: Lamine Yamal scored from the penalty spot but Barcelona needed goalkeeper Joan García to ensure they left Rayo Vallecano with a point after a 1-1 draw in the Spanish league on Sunday.

arts.ttl: VAR nowhere to be seen as champions Barca are held by Rayo in La Liga
arts.sum: There was VAR drama as Barcelona dropped two valuable points in La Liga on Sunday night, with the reining champions held by an impressive Rayo Vallecano outfit.

arts.ttl: Barcelona Player Ratings vs. Rayo Vallecano: Joan Garcia Rescues a Point in 1–1 Draw
arts.sum: Barcelona were dominated by Rayo Vallecano in the second half and lucky to escape with a draw.

arts.ttl: Joan Garcia 10, Pedri 9.0 | Rayo Vallecano 1-1 Barcelona: Player ratings
arts.sum: A challenging encounter at Vallecas ends in a draw for Barcelona and Rayo Vallecano. Ultimately, both teams leave the game with one point each.
